scripts.test:e2e:emu:exec: cross-env GCLOUD_PROJECT=demo-vz-price-guide VITE_FIREBASE_EMULATORS=1 firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,auth --project demo-vz-price-guide --import=./.emulator-data "node scripts/run-e2e.js"
scripts.seed:emu: cross-env GCLOUD_PROJECT=demo-vz-price-guide FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:8080 FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:9099 VITE_FIREBASE_EMULATORS=1 node scripts/seed-emulator.js
scripts.seed:emu:exec: cross-env GCLOUD_PROJECT=demo-vz-price-guide VITE_FIREBASE_EMULATORS=1 firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,auth --project demo-vz-price-guide --import=./.emulator-data "node scripts/seed-emulator.js"
scripts.seed:emu:dry: cross-env GCLOUD_PROJECT=demo-vz-price-guide FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:8080 FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:9099 VITE_FIREBASE_EMULATORS=1 DRY_RUN=true node scripts/seed-emulator.js
scripts.test:e2e:emu:seeded: cross-env GCLOUD_PROJECT=demo-vz-price-guide VITE_FIREBASE_EMULATORS=1 firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,auth --project demo-vz-price-guide --import=./.emulator-data "node scripts/seed-emulator.js && node scripts/run-e2e.js"
scripts.visual:tests: cross-env GCLOUD_PROJECT=demo-vz-price-guide FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:8080 FIREBASE_AUTH_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:9099 VITE_FIREBASE_EMULATORS=1 node scripts/run-visual-tests.js
